oba asa athi prashnaya buddhi ghocharayi.jyothishaya igena ganna kalayedi matath oya gataluwa thadin thibu deyak.lagnayen kendra gathawa athiwana pancha maha yoga sadugen kendra gathawath athiwana bawa boho pothpath wala liya thibenawa.parani indiyanu pothwala pancha maha purusha yoga dakwa aththe adala grahayan lagnayen kendra gatha wana wita bawayi.saduge kathawa aadi aththe ape sinhala poth pathwalayi.aar.ech. wiliyam mahathage "jyothisha athpotha" 58 pituwe pancha mahapurusha yoga lagnayen menma sadugen kendra gatha wana witada athiwana bawa dakwa atha.wenath sinhala poth bohomayaka dakwa aththe lagnayen kendragatha wimayi.(" 550 yoga" piyasena rathu withana)kohomada ithin mama uththara denne.habayi ape thaththagen me gana ahuwahama eya kiwwenam lagnayen menma sadugen kendra gathawa kuja,budha,guru,sikuru,shani grahayan uchcha ho keshathrawa sitina wita pancha maha purusha yoga yedena bawayi.2)kemadhrama yogaya hadenne sadugen depasama kisidu grahayaku nomathi wimayi.meya niyama lesa yedenne sadugen depasa anshaka 30 sambandhawayi.kemadhrama yogaya dutu pamanin kendra himiya "dilindek" yayi kiyanna giyoth waradiyi.yogaya bhanga karana wenath yoga balayayi kiyanna oona.
